articles.description: Balinese authorities are being forced to take drastic measures as social media videos show residents blatantly flouting coronavirus protocols.
articles.content:
An entire village in Bali has been sealed off and isolated with hundreds of its 1200 residents suspected of having COVID-19 in a worrying development for the holiday island.
So serious is the perceived threat that local authorities have brought the military … [+2890 chars]

articles.content:
